title: Helpem Mifala: aid for Solomon Islands
creator_credit: Graham Chase, Don Murray and Australian Agency for International Development
brief_description: Examines Australia’s aid scheme to the Solomon Islands which became independent in 1978. As well as financial aid, technical and medical advisors are assisting the Islands in their development. Photographer - Dean Semler; editor - Sue Horsley; sound - Bob Hayes.
creator_credit_for_label: Graham Chase, Don Murray and Australian Agency for International Development
